General.Name: Primotec Group Ltd
General.Description: Primotec Group Ltd produces, imports, and markets a range of consumer products in Israel and Europe. It offers cleaning materials, paper products, nylon products, disposable products, perfumes, household equipment, ancillary equipment for medicine and geriatrics, and packaging products, as well as accessories and furniture for hygienic spaces. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Beersheba, Israel.
